alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Randolph; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 9:02AM CDT until March 27 at 11:22PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Alabama... Tallapoosa River At Wadley affecting Chambers, Tallapoosa and Randolph Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tallapoosa River Basin and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by this evening, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Tallapoosa River At Wadley. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding of pasture lands in the area occurs and cattle and farm equipment should be moved to higher ground if higher stages are forecast. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 13.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM CDT Monday was 13.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is near crest, and is expected to fall below flood stage later today and continue falling to 5.7 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
